sentences.sContent: Down the bar, he tried it on the kid—he was drinking Scotch and water or something like that—and found out he could push him around.
sentences.sContent_eng: Down the bar, he tried it on the kid—he was drinking Scotch and water or something like that—and found out he could push him around.
sentences.sCn: 酒保走到吧台另一端，询问起那个小伙——他喝的是掺水的苏格兰威士忌之类的东西——发觉可以向他成功兜售。

synos.tran: 弄伤；制止转动；扑灭；镇压

trans.tranCn: 苏格兰人的；苏格兰语的
